member.name: P:Aptify.Framework.Web.Common.TabControl.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Aptify.Framework.Web.Common.TabControl.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: T:Aptify.Framework.Web.Common.TabControl.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: E:Aptify.Framework.Web.Common.TabControl.AptifyWebTab.LoadTabContent
member.summary: This event is raised whenever a tab needs to be loaded dynamically. During this event, the user of this control should populate the ContentPane of the tab in question and those controls will be rendered and sent back to the client via the callback.

member.name: P:Aptify.Framework.Web.Common.TabControl.AptifyWebTab.ContentLoadMode
member.summary: This property determines if the content is to be loaded dynamically via callbacks or if it is to be loaded via static mode when a page is first loaded. If set to load with the DynamicCallback setting, the LoadTabContent event is raised by the control when required. This event is only raised once per tab when a tab is first shown.

member.name: P:Aptify.Framework.Web.Common.TabControl.AptifyWebTab.TabsPerRow
member.summary: Number of tabs per row. If this property is set, it will automatically redistribute the tabs that already exist across the number of rows that are required for the number of tabs in place. When new tabs are added, they will automatically be added to a new row, when requird, based on the TabsPerRow property.

member.name: P:Aptify.Framework.Web.Common.TabControl.AptifyWebTab.AutoFitTabRows
member.summary: Automatically wrap tabs into new rows (on the client) based on the size of the tab control. This property defaults to False, but when set to True will cause the tab control to ignore the TabsPerRow property and instead automatically add/remove rows as required based on the number of tabs that can fit on each row based on the width of the tab control at run time.

member.name: M:Aptify.Framework.Web.Common.TabControl.AptifyWebTab.DistributeTabs
member.summary: This method is responsible for distributing tabs across rows based on the TabsPerRow property. This method will override any specialized row allocation that was previously done and is called by TabsPerRow property when the value changes.

member.name: M:Aptify.Framework.Web.Common.TabControl.AptifyWebTab.AddRow
member.summary: Creates a new row and returns it

member.name: M:Aptify.Framework.Web.Common.TabControl.AptifyWebTab.SetupCallback
member.summary: This method is responsible for setting up the call back functionality and is called from CreateChildControls only when the ContentLoadMode=DynamicCallback

member.summary: Aptify Web Tab Control - ASP.Net Server Control

member.summary: Abstract base class used by other Web Tab components, implements DIV based components instead of SPAN based components.
